salary() - method of the class imdb_person

save_image() - method of the class movieposterdb
Save an image to the image dir The image will be retrieved from the passed URL and stored in the configured mdb::photodir, using the filename part of the URL specified.

Save the photo to disk

Search for episodes or movies

Get the number of seasons or 0 if not a series

Set an auth user and password to use for the request.

Select a custom port to use for the request.

setsearchname() - method of the class imdbsearch
Set the name (title) to search for 
seturl() - method of the class imdbsearch
Set the URL (overwrite default search URL and run your own) This URL will be reset if you call the setsearchname() method
